item.title: Microbiome: 16S Data Visualization/Analysis
item.description: This markdown outlines instructions for visualization and analysis of OTU-clustered amplicon sequencing data, primarily using the phyloseq package. Prerequisites R basics Data manipulation with dplyr and %>% Data visualization with ggplot2 R packages CRAN packages tidyverse (readr, dplyr, ggplot2) magrittr reshape2 vegan ape ggpubr RColorBrewer Bioconductor packages phyloseq DESeq2 Required Data Files We will use the output files generated during the sequence processing steps.
